summary: The implementation provides a comprehensive workout tracking application with exercise filtering, weight logging, and progress tracking. Most requirements are implemented, including backend data models, CRUD operations, filtering methods, and frontend UI pages. However, several key features are missing or incomplete: workouts list display functionality, comprehensive workout session management, and the seeding of a diverse exercise database.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement backend methods to retrieve workout list
missing_requirements.reason: Backend has getWorkout for single workout but no getAllWorkouts or listWorkouts method to retrieve all workouts

missing_requirements.requirement: Create workouts list page that displays all saved workouts with ability to view workout details and start a workout session
missing_requirements.reason: WorkoutsList.tsx only shows empty state with no implementation to fetch and display existing workouts. No workout session starting functionality is present.

missing_requirements.requirement: User can start a workout session from the list
missing_requirements.reason: No workout session functionality exists anywhere in the codebase - no UI elements or backend methods for starting/managing active workout sessions

missing_requirements.requirement: Seed the backend with a comprehensive starter exercise database including common exercises across all equipment types and muscle groups (minimum 30 diverse exercises)
missing_requirements.reason: Backend has seedExercises function (truncated in diff) but its implementation and comprehensiveness cannot be verified. No evidence of 30+ diverse exercises seeded across all categories.
